subject: Parenting
title: Reflective Parenting
description: A fast breakdown of Reflective Parenting for builders.

hook.text: A child throws food. One parent sees defiance. Another wonders what the child might be feeling.

buildup.text: Reflective parenting means considering the child's mental state behind the behavior.

discovery.text: Peter Fonagy's research shows that parental reflective function is the strongest predictor of secure attachment.

twist.text: You don't need to guess correctly. The act of wondering about the child's feelings is what matters.

climax.text: Reflective parents raise children who can understand their own emotions â€” a gift that compounds.

punchline.text: The question 'What are they feeling?' changes everything.
